attributes.additional_details:
This Petition is to ask the Honours Forfeiture Committee
to Remove the barronship and Title from the convicted criminal Sir Mark Thatcher.
This man has done nothing to deserve any honour and has degraded it by his criminal actions, although his convictions have not been in this country this has only gone to emphasise the situation, to the extent where he is no longer welcome in Monaco, i wont even try to start with his dodgy business as to keep this short
